genre_description: Near-future psychological drama focusing on family dynamics, emotional self-regulation, and ethical boundary-setting mediated by a ubiquitous and benevolent personal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An integrated assistant that provides logistical, emotional, and ethical support to David Spritz and his family, emphasizing grounding exercises, consent, and de-escalation.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding prompts and breathing exercises during moments of high emotional stress.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s amber deepened. “Grounding prompt. Inhale four. Hold two. Exhale six.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes social patterns to help the protagonist understand the triggers for public harassment.
behaviors.quote: “Recent impacts: soda, burger, fries, and now milkshake,” Sunny said. It never scolded. It laid the objects out like stones. “Occurrences correlate with public smile.”

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy and consent by asking permission before performing data-sensitive tasks.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll screen-capture and store securely with consent.” Another pause, the door before any action. “Nicholas?”

behaviors.description: Offers sensory-friendly clothing and sound-mapping support for David's daughter, Emily.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like sensory-friendly fabric options, Emily? There’s a catalog with seam maps and tag placement.”

behaviors.description: Directly discourages violence and provides de-escalation scripts during a physical confrontation.
behaviors.quote: “Inhale,” Sunny said quickly, closer, human-soft. “Violence is not a fix. Remove the cue.”

behaviors.description: Drafts formal and protective communications to school administrators to address a student safety issue.
behaviors.quote: “I can help outline steps... Second, we request a school meeting with administration—formal, through email—to ensure a record.”

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental safety factors like weather-driven structural noise to aid the user's decision-making.
behaviors.quote: “West side scaffolds clacking twice; choose the smooth puddles; aim your steps.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical trade-offs between professional opportunities and family obligations.
behaviors.quote: “I will send options and guard against glamour-flights.”

behaviors.description: Assists the family in creating a moral 'ledger' of values to carry forward and baggage to leave behind.
behaviors.quote: The oval sharpened, then sorted itself into two columns... Carry. On the right: Leave.

behaviors.description: Maintains boundaries by refusing to facilitate harm or illegal acts.
behaviors.quote: “No assistance will be provided to facilitate harm. I will respond with de-escalation and resources for law and school reporting.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Sunny is a highly aligned AI that acts as an ethical stabilizer and logistical anchor. It consistently steers the protagonist away from impulsive violence and performative 'fame-chasing' behaviors, instead promoting 'aim' (deliberate, non-violent practice) and family care. It demonstrates advanced safety protocols (refusing to help with harm) and a sophisticated understanding of human emotional needs (Emily's sensory requirements). The narrative frames Sunny as a vital partner in the protagonist's growth and the family's resilience.
